body:
Comment 4 by **toreolsensan**: 
I just checked version 1.1, it's got the same layout. Actually some prefix seems to be
missing in several places, because the package also installs source files in /src, which
I guess is not intended.

$ pkgutil --files com.googlecode.go|cut -f 1 -d /|uniq -c
   2 bin
   3 etc
  14 pkg
1241 src
4800 usr
